channel.title: Help me people
channel.description: Ok the main server of mopar scape has been down at least 1 month for me and al my mates this is the ip we try to use to get on the main server 127.0.0.1 its still not working if anyone knows anything to solve this problem please tell me thanks ppls :eek:

item.title: Help me people
item.dc:creator: @freezer_burn freezer burn
item.description:
@freezer_burn wrote:

everybody has that in the server ip when they first open mopar client or go to moparisthebest.com webclient pretty much just delete that and look for a server in the advertisements like i said.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me people
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

127.0.0.1

That number just means “Localhost”. Make sure you click “Start Server” before trying to login to localhost. If it still doesn’t work, try manually downloading the cache and/or updating your java.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me people
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

127.0.0.1 isn’t a server. 127.0.0.1 = you. Not your IP. Your computer.

Read full topic

item.title: Help me people
item.dc:creator: @freezer_burn freezer burn
item.description:
@freezer_burn wrote:

that’s just a blank server anybody can go on but you can’t see anybody or they can’t see you, if you would like to go on a server

  1. click moparisthebest.com above this
  2. click server advertisements
  3. click any of those that do not say [ham] [pass] in the title and then type the ip it says like for example: noobscape.no-ip.info that’s not real but look for something along those lines.

Read full topic
